Contents of text block. Supports markdow: I work at the intersection of planning and analysis in regional government. I specialize in geospatial analysis and visualization and have considerable experience in R package development, using aggregated location-based services (LBS) analysis to research regional parks visitors, and building interactive data visualization tools for housing, parcel, and ACS data.
I blog about data science and visualization on my blog [lizroten.info/blog.](https://lizroten.info/blog)
